Class MathUtil

extends java.lang.Object
    Contains additional mathematical functions.

    • Method Detail

      • sqrt

        public static java.math.BigDecimal sqrt(java.math.BigDecimal dValue)
        Calculates the square root of a BigDecimal value with a maximum scale of 16 digits.
        Parameters:
        dValue - The value to calculate the square root of
        Returns:
        A big decimal containing the square root value

      • sqrt

        public static java.math.BigDecimal sqrt(java.math.BigDecimal dValue,
                                        int nScale)
        Calculate the square root of a BigDecimal with the Babylonian method. See this StackOverflow question for additional infos.
        Parameters:
        dValue - The value to calculate the square root of
        nScale - The maximum scale of the result
        Returns:
        A big decimal containing the square root value
